numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a similarity in the percentages.
3. One group has fewer people than the other group.
4. However, both groups have similar probabilities.
5. I wonder about the original purpose of the graph.
6. I wonder how the graph relates to me.
7. I wonder how the graph relates to my community.
8. More young people responded to the survey.
9. I ask what is happening in this graph.
10. The graph shows what people think the world is like.
11. I ask how good Earth is currently.
12. I want a catchy headline that captures the main idea of the graph.
